channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2023120711
item.description:
Report X-2023120711

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: SAINT PAUL
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND WET AND LEAKING FROM ONE SIDE OF THE BOX. DescribePack: ONE PLASTIC GALLON BOTTLE CAP LOOSE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: LEAKED A LITTLE LIQUID OUT OF BOTTLE.

DescribePack: A corner of one of the bottles was dented and cracked, causing leakage of the hazmat DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a salvage drum.
